State.Author: Tannin - MO2 Team
State.Description: Mod Organizer (MO) is a tool for managing mod collections of arbitrary size. It is specifically designed for people who like to experiment with mods and thus need an easy and reliable way to install and uninstall them.
State.Name: Mod Organizer 2

State.Author: AUGSpeed
State.Description: Turn the Commonwealth into a true wasteland! Ammo is scarce, and so is food and water. You will need to use every advantage you have to survive. But, every interaction has just a bit more of a classic feel to it. This modlist transforms Fallout 4 into a much more full, believable and exciting world!
State.Name: Fallout 4 Enhanced Edition - A Hardcore RPG Fallout 4 Modlist - Made with Horizon

State.Author: BiRaitBec
State.Description: Complete Modlist and Load Order Guide for Best Fallout 4 Modding Experience. Extreme Fallout 4 Engine & Textures Mods Optimization.
State.Name: Fallout 4 Mod List and Load Order Guide (BiRaitBec Modlist)

State.Author: noidkid
State.Description:
Optimized for Immersive Gameplay and Performance

*SweetFX Wrapper (no Reshade)*

*Vanilla based*

*Removes washed-out/white-film look*

*Subtle Luma Sharpening*

*Subtle Bloom for increased lighting dynamics*

*Unobtrusive, true-to-life DOF*
State.Name: Subtle ENB - Immersive Wasteland Preset

State.Author: Kerber
State.Description: This mod allows preload F4SE plugins before the game initializes.

State.Description: It's like buffout but for the engine

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Campsite is a simple, lightweight camping mod that adds craftable / carryable tents, sleeping bags (new HD textures!), dog beds, fires, lanterns, and cooking pot, each with their own unique dynamics, sounds, interactivity.  Simple enough for light play, detailed enough to make you feel involved.
State.Name: Campsite - Simple Wasteland Camping (and HD Sleeping Bags)

State.Author: Antrix
State.Description: Horizon compatibility patches collection.

State.Author: Captain-Ultima
State.Description: Adds a total of 27 fallout 76 inspired power armor paints in to the game. Out of these sets 19 are for all Power Armor, that’s 76 paints! On top of that we have the Appalachian Brotherhood paints for T-60 as well as Presidential T-60, Scorched X-01 and Blood Eagle Raider paints. To top it off, we have some CC optional Paints.
State.Name: Captain's Power Armor Paint Pack 2

State.Author: WJS
State.Description: This is the Super Sledge from Fallout 3 and Fallout: New Vegas remade for use in Fallout 4 (STANDALONE.)This mod includes 7 attachments and the return of "Oh, Baby!" from New Vegas. Big thanks to asXas, TheRizzler1, Kayomn, Lazlo and Vicyorus. If you helped me out at some point but I haven't mentioned you here don't worry, I'm super grateful.

State.Author: WJS
State.Description: This is the Super Sledge from Fallout 3 and Fallout: New Vegas remade for use in Fallout 4 (STANDALONE.)This mod includes 7 attachments and the return of "Oh, Baby!" from New Vegas. Big thanks to asXas, TheRizzler1, Kayomn, Lazlo and Vicyorus. If you helped me out at some point but I haven't mentioned you here don't worry, I'm super grateful.

State.Author: Crimsomrider
State.Description:
This mod brings 89 lore-friendly outfits and 1 hat for both men and women, which are fully customizable and upgradable while also worn by settlers and wastelanders.



178 outfits in total to make NPCs more varied and lore-friendly in order to reflect the current state of The Commonwealth.
State.Name: Clothing Of The Commonwealth - Mega Outfit Pack - (VANILLA-EVB-CBBE) (AWKCR-AE)

State.Description: New weapons - for those who love revolvers and plasma!

State.Name: Commonwealth Gunfire Overhaul - realistic weapon sounds

Original.Name: Follower Stealth Distance Fixes - Now with Dog Leash-15823-4-2-1591466470.7z

State.Author: spacefiddle
State.Description: A simple change that prevents your companion from charging up your posterior at full speed whenever you enter stealth. Also slightly increases their follow distance. Now also prevents Dogmeat from entering player crosshairs every damn time you stop!
State.Name: Companion Stealth Distance Fix (No Free Hugs) - Now with No Dogmeat in Crosshairs

State.Author: Niero
State.Description: Fully customizable cybernetic armor, unique armor mods, palette based paint styles, size options and more. ROBOT HANDS.

State.Description: Adds a new crank-cocking crossbow weapon to the commonwealth.

State.Description: .Adds four new bladed weapons to the game. Three energy melee weapons and re-usable throwing knives. Each with their own unique FX.
State.Name: CROSS_Blades

A soulful requiem for a bygone era. 

81 songs, 4 hours of new music, inspired by old world jazz, rock, and EDM.

Written and recorded by Pat Mahoney.

State.Description: This mod enhances the Minutemen to convert them in a more strong background lore faction. Adds a group of minutemen specialist that can spawns individually as others and gives all minutemen dedicated equipment to add a wild west and steampunk touch.

State.Description: This mod adds full set of custom animations to Fading Signal's Beretta M9FS

Highly detailed military themed power armor paint jobs. All Standalone. 2k and 4k versions NOW AVAILABLE! XBOX ONE version NOW LIVE!

2K confirmed to work.

State.Name: Glock 86 - Plasma Pistol

State.Author: Transient3292
State.Description: This mod aims to flesh out Goodneighbor and make it feel more like a bustling inner-city settlement of the commonwealth. It overhauls Goodneighbor's layout to add life and more NPC activity with new areas to explore, new interiors, vendors and new NPCs.This is a WIP.
State.Name: Goodneighbor Expanded

State.Author: Hitman47101 and DeadPool2099
State.Description: This mod adds a Grease Gun a.k.a. 9mm Submachine Gun, seen in FO2 and FNV

State.Author: llamaRCA
State.Description: April 2017 #1 File of the Month: Heather is a complex, story-driven character with over 1200 lines of custom, voiced dialogue, quests, etc. Heather's unique implementation is designed to improve on the FO4 companion experience.
State.Name: Heather Casdin - A Unique Companion Experience by llamaRCA

State.Description: Patch for Horizon and Heather Casdin for compatibility and implements some of Horizons companion features

State.Author: DogtoothCG Unoctium
State.Description:
The intimidating Hellfire Power Armor from Fallout 3's Broken Steel DLC, finally lands in the Commonwealth. 



Now patched to 0.126
State.Name: Hellfire X-03 Power Armor

State.Author: Seddon4494
State.Description: Join Director of Robotics, Hilda Hughes, as she investigates the Prototype Synth Project. In doing this, the player will be able to enter the memories of five pre-war citizens and then discover their post-war fates. However, all is not well in the Robotics Division. A synth has gone missing and Hilda isn't convinced it was a production error.
State.Name: Hilda Hughes - An Institute Story

State.Author: asXas
State.Description: The HK G11 K2 makes a return from Fallout 2!
State.Name: HK G11 K2 - Kraut Space Magic

State.Description: Adds over 1000 new craftable objects, encompassing craftable versions of a great deal of the base game.  Also includes new build sets, working planters and much much more!
State.Name: Homemaker - Expanded Settlements

State.Author: Yvileapsis - maintained by Greb751
State.Description:
Horizon patches for most of the community-made Power Armors.

Adds features similar to mods like SAR, CPAO, BPAO and P4APA designed to be used with the Horizon overhaul.
State.Name: Horizon - Comprehensive Power Armor Merge

CROSS_RugerMkV

more to come...

State.Description: A patch that expands upon the upgrades when modifying your backpacks in Horizon!

State.Author: Zawinul
State.Description:
Horizon is a large scale overhaul of Fallout 4 that rebalances and expands the gameplay from the ground up.



It contains thousands of changes, redesigned systems, and new additions to very carefully balance everything together.



The goal of this mod is to create a more challenging and immersive experience.
State.Name: Horizon v1.8.0

State.Author: Zana Daniel
State.Description:
A Fallout experience that feels realistic, rewarding, and ultimately much more fun. 

Step out of the vanilla fantasy and step into some reality.

State.Author: Gopher
State.Description: HUD when you need. Hide when you don't.
State.Name: Immersive HUD - iHUD

State.Description: A simple grass mod adding 11 new grass types into the game at varying degrees. Meant to diversify and keep to the vanilla game.

State.Description: Adds more unmarked interior locations to the game.
State.Name: Inside Jobs - Commonwealth Interiors Add-On

State.Author: m
State.Description: Institute Power Armor I-01
State.Name: InstitutePowerArmor

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Ambient light power and fog brightness inside all interiors reduced by 60%, without touching any directional light sources whatsoever, keeping lighting 100% true to vanilla except for those dark corners and unlit areas.  Subways are actually dark and scary!  Not just a filter, actual light data has been altered.  All-DLC covered.
State.Name: Interiors Enhanced - Darker Ambient Light and Fog

State.Author: Seddon4494
State.Description: A dungeon mod with small questline, this mod takes the player through the headquarters of Radium-Inc., a company which made radium-infused products.
State.Name: Introducing - Radium-Inc.

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: Your world, your story. Adds a personal journal that you can type in. Keep track of things you've discovered, chart your journey across the Commonwealth, or write about your daily adventures!
State.Name: Journal of the Sole Survivor - Personal Journal

State.Author: AlpineYJ
State.Description: This mod intends to keep all radiant quests assigned within the commonwealth - in the commonwealth. This means that Scribe Haylen won't be sending you to Far Harbor to retrieve the elusive BoogerTron device, and Mr. Tims won't be sending you to Nuka World to clear out raiders.  The real goal? You don't have to start any DLCs before you
State.Name: Keep Radiants in the Commonwealth

State.Author: akir4 and Wardaddy
State.Description: Makes the institute and standard laser weapons smaller in the 1st person.

State.Name: Live Action Mr. Handy - Lights added to Codsworth and all Handy model Robot eyes encountered or created

Adds a standalone M1 Garand to Fallout 4.



**PING**

State.Author: Rcollpc
State.Description: A few changes that expands your options in the main story including keeping the Railroad alive!
State.Name: Main Quest Choices Extended

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Before their untimely fall, the Minutemen set up Watchtowers around the Commonwealth to keep an eye out from above. Unfortunately, the Minutemen crumbled before the Watchtower's Project was finished, so now the completed ones lay dormant, scattered across the Commonwealth. Each tower contains some loot left behind from the days of the Minutemen.
State.Name: Minuteman Watchtowers

State.Author: Countercruel
State.Description: Adds a find and explore rewards incentive to the Commonwealth after Old Guns - Find the Armory quest.
State.Name: Minutemen Supply Caches

State.Author: CDante
State.Description:
A compilation of my earlier mods that make robot settlers customizable at the Robot Workbench with the Automatron DLC and fixes things like Codsworth not being moddable or Professor Goodfeels' inevitable disappearance from the game.



It's also a framework enabling bot NPC's for other mods like EyeBot Companions or Securitron
State.Name: Moddable Robot Settlers Compilation (Automatron)

State.Author: TrophiHunter Chad509
State.Description: Adds the MP40 to Fallout 4
State.Name: MP40

State.Author: Multiple Authors--see credits
State.Description: I merged a few Fallout 4 music mods.
State.Name: Music Mods Merged

State.Author: Nir Shor
State.Description: This mod Adds Lore friendly professionally produced music tracks to your Fallout 4 playlists.
State.Name: Musical Lore - Wasteland Edition (Soundtrack Mod By Nir Shor)

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: A small plugin to remove combat boundaries, so enemies will follow you indoors from outside and vice versa.
State.Name: No Combat Boundaries

State.Author: twizz0r
State.Description: A simple texture replacement to remove the persistent fake puddles from the game. No more fake reflections!
State.Name: No More Fake Puddles

State.Author: skyquest

State.Author: TinyManticore
State.Description: Provides Alternate start, Quick start, Normal start options.  When you use one of the alternate start paths, there are over 800 dialogue edits, with voice and lip sync, so your character is no longer the mother/father of Shaun (or even a Vault Dweller, if you want).  Great for role players.
State.Name: Start Me Up - Alternate Start and Dialogue Overhaul

State.Author: Seddon4494
State.Description: Hidden within the woods of Huntress Island, enveloped by fog, stands Huntress Manor. Once the home of the reclusive but brilliant Professor R.S.G. Hunter, the manor has been abandoned since his sudden, unexplained, death in 1877; it is now known only to the wolves that call the forest their home. Little do they know, the manor holds a terrible secr
State.Name: The Secret of Huntress Manor - A Far Harbor Story

State.Author: Nikonthenet
State.Description:
Now with user configurable brightness via ENB. This high fidelity dark night mod is built to enhance the True Storms experience, adding realism with cinematic flair and moody, at times claustrophobic, atmospherics!



BEWARE THE DARK! Or, make it brighter on the fly while in-game!
State.Name: True Nights (for True Storms with ENB)

State.Description: A few random patches for Horizon.

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: The #5 highest ranked Skyrim mod of 2015 with over 10,000 endorsements comes to Fallout 4 with even more features than ever!  True Storms: Wasteland Edition is a complete overhaul to the storm systems in Fallout 4. Heavy rains, dust storms, radiation rains.  New unique weathers, sound effects, particle effects, textures and more.
State.Name: True Storms - Wasteland Edition (Thunder-Rain-Weather Redone)

State.Author: Seddon4494
State.Description: Vault 494: A Vault-Tec Story adds a new Vault for the player to explore. As the player approaches the Nahant area they will pick up a Vault-Tec distress signal which will begin. From there the player will be free to explore Vault 494, which an accounting error gave an unusually high number, and Vault-Tec's attempts to create a crime-free societ
State.Name: Vault 494 - A Vault-Tec Story

State.Author: LoneRaptor
State.Description: This mod adds a modifiable Viking style battle axe to the game to try and offset the lack of melee weapons in the base game. The axe will be added to the levelled lists via script or you can craft it at the chemistry station.
State.Name: Viking Battle Axe

State.Author: Wasteland Melody
State.Description: Total rebuild of the classic Fallout 3 Chinese Assault Rifle for Fallout 4, complete with new meshes, textures, and full crafting, mods, and levelled list support.
State.Name: Wasteland Melody's Chinese Assault Rifle

Adds short weapon racks that can display all: Small and Medium weapons. and more

Made For Immersion!

Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.



For Players: New controls and faster, more stable workshop scripts.



For Modders: Add new resource types, override settings, and generally change the way settlements work dynamically.

State.Description: FO4Edit is the Fallout 4 version of xEdit. xEdit is an advanced graphical module viewer/editor and conflict detector.
State.Name: FO4Edit

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which makes console menu show extra useful infomation about selected target,for example, target's name, ID, baseID, mod name and so on.This plugin also add some extra info lists to console to show selected actor's all kinds of info like factions, perks, active effects, actor values, equipments and so on.
State.Name: Better Console - F4SE

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.

State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.

State.Author: DinDisco
State.Description: This is the "proving grounds" for any mods/patches I'm working on. Ideally, some of these projects will be getting their own Nexus page upon completion, but for now consider anything here either a public beta or something I feel is too small/incomplete to release on its own.

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description:
A F4SE plugin that allows you to disable the hardcoded, vision-obscuring shader effect at various workbenches so you can actually see what you're crafting.



Also allows you to change the shader effect for the Power Armor station and robot workbenches to a outline-only shader instead of a full shader.
State.Name: Crafting Highlight Fix

State.Author: AUGSpeed
State.Description: Turn the Commonwealth into a true wasteland! Ammo is scarce, and so is food and water. You will need to use every advantage you have to survive. But, every interaction has just a bit more of a classic feel to it. This modlist transforms Fallout 4 into a much more full, believable and exciting world!
State.Name: Fallout 4 Enhanced Edition - A Hardcore RPG Fallout 4 Modlist - Made with Horizon

State.Author: reg2k
State.Description: Faster Workshop is an F4SE plugin that optimizes workshop loading times by replacing some of the most expensive and inefficient regions of workshop loading code with far more efficient versions. Also provides a hotkey to instantly enter Workshop mode and fixes workshop icon load lag.
State.Name: Faster Workshop (Workshop Lag Fix)

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

Now there is a separate version for VR.
State.Name: High FPS Physics Fix

State.Author: MystiriousDawn
State.Description:
This mod brings much higher quality Sun Lensflare and Sun textures

A serious upgrade.
State.Name: MystiriousDawn's HD Lensflare

State.Author: mluppov
State.Description: This will replace ridiculous half transparent... whatever it is with something much nicer.
State.Name: Power Armor HoloHUD

State.Author: Spanian77
State.Description: Changes the texture material used for not having over-brighten map when using power armor.
State.Name: Power Armor map fix

State.Author: Ousnius and Caliente
State.Description: The well-known body enhancer made famous in Skyrim is back for Fallout 4 debut
State.Name: Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Enhancer -CBBE-

State.Author: AUGSpeed
State.Description: Turn the Commonwealth into a true wasteland! Ammo is scarce, and so is food and water. You will need to use every advantage you have to survive. But, every interaction has just a bit more of a classic feel to it. This modlist transforms Fallout 4 into a much more full, believable and exciting world!
State.Name: Fallout 4 Enhanced Edition - A Hardcore RPG Fallout 4 Modlist - Made with Horizon

State.Author: Castell
State.Description: Retextured sunglasses and goggles.
State.Name: Eyewear and mask retexture

Original.Name: Better Locational Damage - Required Game Version 1.10.63 or above-3815-6-5-5-1597593601.zip

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Most realistic damage overhaul you'll find on the whole nexus. Promised.

Features:  Scripted headshots, scripted dismemberment, bleedings, stagger ,stab your enemies from behind, Shotgun knockback and more! Balanced melee and range combat. Settings holotape available to tweak features to your liking or completely disable them!
State.Name: Better Locational Damage and Optional Gameplay Overhauls

State.Author: ScottyX2 and Neolithicjay
State.Description: Fixes Bethesda's shoddy, non-existent alpha maps.
State.Name: Fixed Alpha Maps

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: A much better high contrast world map with roads, topography, and waterline all clearly visible.  Optional number grid and regions.
State.Name: Improved Map with Visible Roads

Original.Name: CBBE for Lola's Dress by Oussebon-8704-1.zip

State.Author: Kris Takahashi
State.Description:
The Tales from the Commonwealth mod adds quests and companions. 

The Atomic Radio mod adds a radio station. 

The Settlers of the Commonwealth mod adds settlers with interesting dialogue.  



Go to 3dnpc.com for details.
State.Name: Atomic Radio and Tales from the Commonwealth

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Ever notice when it's dark that the inside of NPC / Player's mouths glow red even if it's pitch black?  This finally fixes that.  Extremely tiny fix.
State.Name: No More Glowing Mouths

State.Author: nitronizer
State.Description:
Re-Texture from Vanilla Vault Suit. Alternate colors available



Replacing Male and Female Vault Suit
State.Name: Proto Vault Suit

State.Author: SavrenX
State.Description: Enhance All buildings and interior to HD1K quality without sacrifice FPS. Smaller and Lighter than Vanilla. Literally.
State.Name: SavrenX HD 1K Buildings and Interior

State.Description: High resolution body replacers based off the vanilla bodies.
